author: hsiaowei
content:
Happy Sunday!

"Dude, what's the danksharding situation?"

EF Research team is hosting an educational seminar with researchers and core devs on scaling solution "Danksharding" on **Feb 14th (Mon.) at 14:30 UTC**.

Workshop agenda is out: https://notes.ethereum.org/@hww/workshop_feb_2022

We invite core devs and Ethereum protocol researchers to join the online workshop on Zoom. I've sent gCal invitation to the mail list that I used at the workshop one year ago. Please DM me if anyone wants to join but didn't receive the invite. ðŸ™‚
